cards.name: Claw
cards.description: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor.

cards.name: Excess Mana
cards.description: Draw a card. (You can only have 10 Mana in your tray.)

cards.name: Innervate
cards.description: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.

cards.name: Mark of the Wild
cards.description: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)

cards.name: Savage Roar
cards.description: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.

cards.name: Swipe
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.

cards.name: Houndmaster
cards.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.

cards.name: Starving Buzzard
cards.description: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.

cards.name: Kill Command
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.

cards.name: Multi-Shot
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to two random enemy minions.

cards.name: Tracking
cards.description: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.

cards.name: Water Elemental
cards.description: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.

cards.name: Arcane Explosion
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.

cards.name: Arcane Missiles
cards.description: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.

cards.name: Flamestrike
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions.

cards.name: Frostbolt
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.description: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.

cards.name: Guardian of Kings
cards.description: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.

cards.name: Truesilver Champion
cards.description: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.

cards.name: Northshire Cleric
cards.description: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.

cards.name: Holy Nova
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.

cards.name: Mind Blast
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.

cards.name: Mind Control
cards.description: Take control of an enemy minion.

cards.name: Mind Vision
cards.description: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

cards.name: Power Word: Shield
cards.description: Give a minion +2 Health. Draw a card.

cards.name: Shadow Word: Death
cards.description: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.

cards.name: Shadow Word: Pain
cards.description: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.

cards.name: Backstab
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.

cards.name: Fan of Knives
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.

cards.name: Sap
cards.description: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Sinister Strike
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.

cards.name: Vanish
cards.description: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

cards.name: Windspeaker
cards.description: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.

cards.name: Ancestral Healing
cards.description: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.

cards.name: Bloodlust
cards.description: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.

cards.name: Frost Shock
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.

cards.name: Hex
cards.description: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.

cards.name: Rockbiter Weapon
cards.description: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.

cards.name: Healing Totem
cards.description: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to all friendly minions.

cards.name: Dread Infernal
cards.description: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.

cards.name: Corruption
cards.description: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.

cards.name: Drain Life
cards.description: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.

cards.name: Mortal Coil
cards.description: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.

cards.name: Sacrificial Pact
cards.description: Destroy a Demon. Restore 5 Health to your hero.

cards.name: Soulfire
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Discard a random card.

cards.name: Charge
cards.description: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.

cards.name: Cleave
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions.

cards.name: Heroic Strike
cards.description: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.

cards.name: Darkscale Healer
cards.description: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.

cards.name: Frostwolf Warlord
cards.description: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.

cards.name: Gurubashi Berserker
cards.description: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.

cards.name: Nightblade
cards.description: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.

cards.name: The Coin
cards.description: Gain 1 Mana Crystals this turn only.
